Reviews.Title: “get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: rebeccah6
Reviews.Content: boyfriend travelling orlando 2 weeks visit disney universal theme parks april 2011 booking didnt recieve confirmation nervous enquire theme park shuttles rang passed various people getting told information constantly changed able information check quick unfriendly huge map hotel circled directions help suitcases spent 15 minutes trailing hotel grounds cold hours trying frustrating eventually found little help clean 2 double beds reasonably comfortable clean dated tv cable channels ok air conditioning cleaners whilst parks leaving home warm bathroom clean mirror shower sink water scorching towards holiday please beware children water boiling temperature burnt colour sponge hung shower 10 minutes trying lucky cold water coming sink refill water bottles annoying microwave fridge useful comment covered pool looked busy im guessing ok looked restaurant menu night looked limited shuttle services parks prompt friendly helpful pick 3 hotels crowded hot theyre free cant complain information available reception helpful park maps stuff reception staff helpful unfriendly snappy ones day card key wouldnt bags getting park shuttle bags annoying 2 minutes shuttle left facing road chinese buffet walked food looked greasy dominos pizza hut pharmacy chinese takeaway dominos pizza hut nights ok huge throughout stay phone hotel employee named michael phone lines somehow crossed recieved call morning 6am michael simply guest rung mistake forgot sleep recieved calls morning 5 days stay 6am 7am 8am sometimes 3 morning complaining phone telling theyd wrong officially complaining reception apologised theyd fix continued messages left phone michael employees talking rudely guests hotel nice days left phone rung usual 6am michael mad frustrated woken shouted told pissed guess knocked door day didnt ring yay complaint boyfriends birthday stay reception purchase cake time orlando told restaurant help restaurant manager wasnt write note envelope reply cake obviously bothered enhancing guests stay check checking ok bill didnt enjoyed stay wed time ect overall cheap base visiting theme parks recieve exceptional customer service
